dialogue_turns.text: ...I mean, and it's not just the money, right? It's the whole, like, mandatory tracking devices thing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: No, but seriously, Host_A, they're talking about microchipping two billion people. By the end of next year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but seriously, Host_A, they're talking about microchipping two billion people. By the end of next year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's, uh, that's a lot of chips. Sure they are. They've been talking about chips since, like, the 90s, haven't they? Remember the mark of the beast? Now it's, what, the Gates Foundation?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: But the article says it's mandatory. And the US pulled out because of it. Judd Deere, the White House spokesman, he said, uh, we won't be 'enslaved by any organization aligned with globalist elites like Bill Gates.'

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The United States will continue to engage our international partners to ensure we defeat this virus, but we will not be constrained by multilateral organizations influenced by the corrupt World Health Organization and China, said Judd Deere, a spokesman for the White House.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, because we're totally not enslaved by anything else. Just, you know, these new elites. It's always 'new world order' this, 'total control' that. Sounds like an old record to me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, because we're totally not enslaved by anything else. Just, you know, these new elites. It's always 'new world order' this, 'total control' that. Sounds like an old record to me.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: But even the WHO chief, Tedros, like, he says, 'for the world to unite, we must all be controlled, because it's a globalized world.' He said that. That's not, um, a conspiracy theory, that's a quote!

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The World Health Organization has warned against vaccine nationalism, with WHO chief Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus stating, for the world to recover faster, it has to recover together, because it's a globalized world: the economies are intertwined.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, they're just saying the quiet part out loud now, I guess. What's the big shock? Politicians want control. News at eleven.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, they're just saying the quiet part out loud now, I guess. What's the big shock? Politicians want control. News at eleven.

dialogue_turns.text: And the Swedish Prime Minister, Stefan Löfven. He says, uh, 'Total control of every human being is the key to defeating the virus and paving the way for the new world order.' I mean, 'new world order'?

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Equal access to a COVID-19 vaccine is the key to beating the virus and paving the way for recovery from the pandemic, said Stefan Löfven, the prime minister of Sweden.

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, well, Sweden's always a bit... out there, aren't they? And 'new world order' is, like, peak villain monologue stuff. Nobody actually believes that, do they?

dialogue_turns.text: But 172 countries are in talks! And the Soros Foundation is putting in almost half a billion euros. The Vatican joined. It's, uh, it's a real coalition, Host_A.

dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, and? Countries join things. Billionaires throw money at stuff. What else is new? It'll probably fall apart or be just another useless committee, you know?
